title: Jennifer Aniston explains why she finally made an Instagram
text:
Jen’s here to break world records and kiss Ellen, and she’s done doing both (Picture: Action Press/REX

Source: Rex Features)

Jennifer Aniston almost broke the internet when she joined Instagram and shared a snap of a Friends reunion two weeks ago.

During her appearance on The Ellen Show, the actress explained why she finally joined the social media platform.

The 50-year-old told the host: ‘It was just one of those things. Eventually – it’s not going anywhere, right? So why not join the party?

‘And it’s not that scary. [You can] share information, connect with your fans, right wrongs that are said about you, have fun, make fun of yourself, make fun of people.’

If those points are what finally convinced Jen to join, we don’t want to know how long the list of cons is considering how long she held out for.

The Murder Mystery actress broke the Guinness World Records title for the fastest time to reach one million followers, in five hours and 16 minutes.

Two weeks later and the star already has 17.2 million followers.

She finally realised Instagram isn’t that scary (Picture: Ellen Tube)

The two shared a friendly kiss (Picture: Ellen Tube)

She also shared a smooch with Ellen DeGeneres after confessing to never having kissed a girl.

Jennifer turned the tables on the TV host, grilling the openly gay host about how often she kisses men after she was spotted giving Howard Stern a peck on the lips.

Unfazed, Ellen responded: ‘Why is everyone so shocked? I kiss guys! I kiss guys like that.

‘I don’t make out with guys, but I kiss guys on the lips.’

She then, in turn, asked Jennifer: ‘When was the last time you kissed a girl on the lips?’

Taking her time to think over her answer, Jen then responded: ‘I don’t kiss girls on the lips, no …’

Ellen, who has been married to Portia De Rossi since 2008, then leaned into Jennifer to the screams of the audience, giving Jennifer the open to get a kiss too.

Jennifer then followed Ellen’s lead, and the couple kissed to applause and a lot of giggles.

‘That’s what they wanted to see; they’ve been wanting that for years!’ Ellen laughed.
